title: COI Model-Based Language Education Course for Improving Online Employee Training Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and elementary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments for 40+ adult learners considering work/personal schedule constraints: Digital device provision ensures equitable access

learning_goals: Learners can understand the three core elements of the COI model (teaching, social, and cognitive presence) and apply them to online learning activities
Learners can complete language learning modules (reading, writing, vocabulary) at least three times weekly in an LMS-based asynchronous environment
Learners can engage in peer interactions (providing feedback, sharing experiences) on online discussion boards at least twice weekly
Learners can achieve at least 70% proficiency in the final assessment exam

resources: LMS platform (video, quiz, discussion board functionality)
Standardized language learning content (reading, writing, vocabulary)
Collaboration tools promoting interaction (bulletin board, chat)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
